DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether the Seroquel XR treatment for 6 months improves the relapse prevention in schizophrenic outpatients
DOC.brief_title: Seroquel XR in the Long Term Treatment of Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: schizophrenic outpatients on at least 600 mg Seroquel XR treatment for at least 1 month Severe cerebro and cardiovascular disease, severe hepatic impairment, gravidity
